title: State Driver’s License Laws Could Lead to Underdiagnosis of Dementia, According to New Research
description: In states where doctors are required to report dementia cases to the DMV, rates of diagnoses are lower than the national average.

title: Matthew Perry Wanted to Be Remembered for Helping Others In Recovery From Addiction
description: Many are remembering the beloved 'Friends' star for the ways he which he strove to help people recovering from addiction

title: What Russia Hopes to Gain From the Israel-Hamas Conflict
description: Hopes rise in the Kremlin that the Israel-Gaza war will divert attention away from Ukraine.

title: FIFA Bans Luis Rubiales of Spain for 3 Years for Misconduct at Women’s World Cup Final
description: Rubiales forcibly kissed a player on the lips at the trophy ceremony of the Women's World Cup final.

title: What the World Gets Wrong About Hamas
description: Both groups have committed horrific acts of violence but equating them could lead to bad policy decisions.

title: Former Officer Who Fired into Breonna Taylor’s Home Goes on Trial Again
description: The trial will mark a second attempt by prosecutors to convict Brett Hankison for his actions on the night Taylor.

title: Earth Will Lock in 1.5°C of Warming By 2029 At Current Rate of Burning Fossil Fuels
description: New study warns that if the world keeps burning fossil fuels at its current rate, earth's carbon budget will be used up in six years.

title: Pence, Who Couldn’t Derail Trump, Is Looking at Who Might
description: Pence, who has said Trump must “never” be allowed to return to power, is weighing who to endorse, advisers say.

title: President Biden Will Sign an Executive Order on AI Safeguards
description: The order reflects the government's effort to shape how AI evolves.

title: How Prison Book Bans Dwarf All Other Censorship
description: PEN America’s new report, Reading Between the Bars, details the many ways prisons censor books.

title: America’s Border Wall Is Bipartisan
description: Biden continues a tradition of building fences at the US-Mexico border that long precedes Donald Trump

title: How to Cultivate Hope When You Don’t Have Any
description: Hope is a way of thinking—and experts say it can be taught.

title: ‘Nobody Believes in Our Victory Like I Do.’ Inside Volodymyr Zelensky’s Struggle to Keep Ukraine in the Fight
description: Volodymyr Zelensky was running late. The invitation to his speech at the National Archives in Washington had gone out to several hundred guests, including congressional leaders and top officials from the Biden Administration. Billed as the main event of his visit in late September, it would give him a chance to inspire U.S. support against…

title: Fleeing Despair, More Chinese Migrants Are Journeying to the U.S. Border to Seek Asylum
description: Chinese asylum-seekers and observers tell the AP they are seeking to escape an increasingly repressive political climate and bleak economic prospects.
